channel.title: meta on Austin Delamar
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Austin Delamar

item.title: Switching Gears
item.description: Maybe you haven’t noticed, but its been a few months since my last blog post. Here’s just a quick recap of what I’ve been up to, and what to expect from me going forward. Writing a blog has been a learning process for me and I’m adapting as I go.

item.title: Back Online After Migrating DBs
item.description: Maybe you haven’t noticed, but its been a few months since my last blog post. The reason being two fold: I migrated my blog db from MySQL to Cloudant. The WYSIWYG editor on my dashboard wasn’t ready. Now that I’ve got an alpha 1.

item.title: Problems with building your own blogsite
item.description: Back in 2014 I decided to start blogging. (Cue sad trumpet horn.) Well… I tried to. Turns out, blogging is like a second job. Always second-shift work, after my day job. Long hours with no OT or health benefits. But hey!

item.title: 2nd Update
item.description: Its been quite a while, since I started my website, and now I’m getting back into things. I’ve got lots to share, and will be posting more to my other pages. I’ve added 2 Projects to my Past Projects page. Senior Project and Bookmarks for Bluemix.

item.title: First!
item.description: This post marks when I started building my first blog on Wix, a website-generating factory. Ever since I started my blog on their site, I kept getting a nagging feeling, that I wasn’t doing it right… I wasn’t programming… I was cheating.
